column5: Wayne flying up north today and took couple of pics.After and few cold nights and some more fresh snow it looks like some warmer weather finally touching down and 0c at night.This will help big time.first pic is Perrault Falls and second pic is the West Narrows on Clay Lake.
Nice shots...all the narrows around NWO will start flowing pretty good in the next few days. Important to know all the in- bound tributaries if travelling on lakes this time of year.
